sentences.en: “He comes across as a very sincere, religious individual”(&b{William L. Clay})
sentences.cn: “他给人的印象是一个很虔诚的、笃实的人”(&b{威廉L.克莱})

sentences.en: "You must come to Tinsley's graduation party." — "I'd be delighted."
sentences.cn: “你一定要来参加廷斯利的毕业聚会。”——“我很乐意。”

sentences.en: A food processor comes in handy.
sentences.cn: 食品加工处理机用来十分便利

sentences.en: a party that came off.
sentences.cn: 成功的晚会

sentences.en: An indictment finally came down.
sentences.cn: 终于宣判起诉

sentences.en: came across my old college roommate in town today.
sentences.cn: 今天在镇上遇到我大学的老同学

sentences.en: came across with the check.
sentences.cn: 开支票支付

sentences.en: came back with a sharp riposte.
sentences.cn: 以尖锐的反驳回答

sentences.en: came in fifth.
sentences.cn: 第五名

sentences.en: Can you come here for a minute?
sentences.cn: 你到这里来一会儿好吗？

sentences.en: Come a bit closer and you’ll be able to see better.
sentences.cn: 靠近一些就能看得更清楚。

sentences.en: Come along, lad. Time for you to get home.
sentences.cn: 来吧，小伙子。你该回家了。

sentences.en: come at an education through study.
sentences.cn: 经由研究得到教育

sentences.en: Come on over, we've got lots of the old gang here.
sentences.cn: 过来吧，好多老朋友都在这儿。

sentences.en: Come on, Bill. Send Tom a card and make his day.
sentences.cn: 来吧，比尔。给汤姆寄张卡片让他高兴高兴吧。

sentences.en: comes on as an old-fashioned reactionary.
sentences.cn: 表现出象保守主义者

sentences.en: customs that come down from colonial times.
sentences.cn: 从殖民时代传承下来的惯例

sentences.en: Darkness came on after seven.
sentences.cn: 七点以后天色渐暗

sentences.en: Don't expect me to come and visit you there.
sentences.cn: 别指望我会去那儿看你。

sentences.en: Don't take the first offer that comes along.
sentences.cn: 不要采取他人的第一个提议

sentences.en: Everything came out wrong.
sentences.cn: 每件事都是错误地结束

sentences.en: fainted but soon came around.
sentences.cn: 昏迷但马上苏醒

sentences.en: Fall clothes will be coming in soon.
sentences.cn: 秋装即将上市

sentences.en: He has really come down in the world.
sentences.cn: 他在这个世界上真的失去了地位

sentences.en: I wear my old shoes every day. One sole has come unglued.
sentences.cn: 我每天都穿那双旧鞋，有一只鞋底已经脱胶了。

sentences.en: I'll come along on the hike.
sentences.cn: 我将徒步旅行来

sentences.en: Interest rates would come down as the recovery gathered pace.
sentences.cn: 随着复苏的加速，利率会降下来。

sentences.en: Let me know when they come.
sentences.cn: 他们来了就告诉我。

sentences.en: Many of the clothes come from the world's top fashion houses.
sentences.cn: 这些服装中有很多出自世界顶级时装设计公司。

sentences.en: Mortgages are hard to come by.
sentences.cn: 抵押难以获得

sentences.en: New weather information just came in.
sentences.cn: 新气象信息刚被采用

sentences.en: Physical and ideological barriers had come down in Eastern Europe.
sentences.cn: 物质和意识形态上的障碍在东欧已不复存在。

sentences.en: Rumours of financial scandals have come bubbling back to the surface.
sentences.cn: 有关财务丑闻的谣言接连不断地冒出来。

sentences.en: She called her young son: "Here, Stephen, come and look at this!"
sentences.cn: 她喊她的小儿子：“喂，斯蒂芬，过来看看这个!”

sentences.en: She came into a fortune on her 21st birthday.
sentences.cn: 她在二十一岁生日的时获得了一笔遗产

sentences.en: She came out at age 18 in New York City.
sentences.cn: 她于十八岁在纽约城初入社交圈

sentences.en: She is sure to come off badly if challenged to explain.
sentences.cn: 如果被要求解释，她肯定表现得很差

sentences.en: Sleet came on after one o'clock.
sentences.cn: 在一点钟后冰雹到来了

sentences.en: The author's new book just came out.
sentences.cn: 作家的新书刚出版

sentences.en: The final word will still come from the Secretary of State.
sentences.cn: 最后仍然要由国务卿来定夺。

sentences.en: The governor came out in favor of tax breaks.
sentences.cn: 这位政府官员公开宣布赞成停止征税

sentences.en: The pilot's voice came in loud and clear.
sentences.cn: 飞行员回应的声音大而清晰

sentences.en: The trip came off on schedule.
sentences.cn: 旅行按计划得到实现

sentences.en: The whole story came out at the trial.
sentences.cn: 整个真相在审问中变得众所周知

sentences.en: The worst of the storm is yet to come.
sentences.cn: 最猛烈的暴风雨就要来了。

sentences.en: There are thousands of students absolutely gagging to come to this university.
sentences.cn: 肯定有成千上万的学生都渴望到这所大学念书。

sentences.en: Things are coming along fine.
sentences.cn: 事情进展顺利

sentences.en: trying to come on to me during the party.
sentences.cn: 在宴会期间力图亲近我

sentences.en: We'll go to a meeting in Birmingham and come straight back.
sentences.cn: 我们将去伯明翰参加会议，然后马上回来。

sentences.en: What time will you be coming home ?
sentences.cn: 你什么时候能回家？

sentences.en: What's coming down tonight?
sentences.cn: 今晚发生了什么事情?

sentences.en: When editorial review commences, that's where you come in.
sentences.cn: 编辑复审开始时，那有你要做的工作

sentences.en: When I saw the picture, happy memories came back.
sentences.cn: 当我看到这照片，美好的回忆又再度浮现

sentences.en: Would you please come on! We'll be late!
sentences.cn: 请快一点吧！我们要晚了！

sentences.en: You'll come around after you hear the whole story.
sentences.cn: 你听到整个故事之后你会明白

sentences.en: You've used the same feeble excuse for weeks. Come on!
sentences.cn: 几个星期以来你一直采用相同的无力借口。别再装了

words.tran_cn: 即将到来的；接着的；前途有望的
来者，来的人；有成功希望的人

phrases.tran_cn: 为某种目的而来取；向…冲来；对…进行袭击
走进；险些；可与…相比（多用于否定句）
制止：制止一种不合适的行为；放弃一种职位或态度；强迫。主要用于祈使语气
揭露某人同性恋的身份
走近；发生；开始；上升；发芽；被提出
与……一起供给；伴随……发生；从……开始

trans.tran_cn: 来，到达，行进，发生，位于，成为
trans.tran_en: to move towards you or arrive at the place where you are
to move towards you or arrive at the place where you are
